entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
